title: Drawing, Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Purple, Red, Black Stripes, early 20th century
title_raw: Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Purple, Red, Black Stripes
medium: brush and watercolor [and gouache?] on off-white wove coated paper
markings: On verso, to right of center (above inscription): partly legible Wiener Werkstatte stamp printed in purple ink. [see notes]
inscribed: Verso, inscribed in graphite to right of center: 3/109/51 ; at lower left corner: 1165 [above] 1632(3) [with horizontal line between them]
description: Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) design for decorated paper:  hand-painted stripes in black/brown, purple, lavender, and red, overlaid with repeat pattern of small gray sprigs or branches.  The stripes bleed through the thin paper.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Purple, Red, Black Stripes, early 20th century. brush and watercolor [and gouache?] on off-white wove coated paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen. 1999-6-7.
